description: This file is a JavaScript source file that defines the main application component for a Lightning.js based UI called 'Recipe Explorer'. It sets up theming, components, layout template, and routing.

classes.name: Application
classes.description: The main Lightning application created via Blits.Application, setting theme, components, layout, and routes.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Defines the application state, including theme colors and title.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Specifies the components (Home and RecipeDetail) used within the application.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Defines the Lightning markup for the application's UI layout.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: Specifies routing configuration for navigation within the app.
